articles.title: Ballina tractor run supports Alzheimer Society
articles.description: The organisers of the Patrick McKeogh Memorial Tractor run are happy to announce that €10,000 was raised at the 2024 tractor run for the Alzheimer Society of Ireland.
articles.content:

articles.description: Several health advocacy groups on Friday filed a petition with the Supreme Court questioning the zero subsidy for state insurer Philippine Health Insurance Corporation (PhilHealth) in the 2025 national budget.
articles.content:

articles.title: Elon Musk's SpaceX makes history with 500th Falcon 9 launch, marking reusability milestone
articles.description: The latest launch lifted off from Cape Canaveral, Florida. It was celebrated widely by SpaceX engineers and CEO Elon Musk.
articles.content:
Falcon 9 Completes 500 Missions (Image: SpaceX)
SpaceX has marked a special moment in its journey. Its trusted Falcon 9 rocket has now flown 500 missions into space.

articles.title: Pakistan’s cities sizzle under extreme hot weather: PMD
articles.description: Highest temperature recorded in Sibbi at 47 degrees Celsius while Bahawalpur bakes with 55.8°C; Karachi records ‘feels like’ temperature of 50.4°C.
articles.content:
The country experienced extremely hot and dry weather on Friday with the perceived or ‘Feels Like’ temperature crossing 50 degrees Celsius in four cities.
